maqras.text: geuui dongbanjaga juyeo jega geuleul joeag-eulo yuhoghaji anihaess-eumyeogeu seuseulo keuge banghwanghayeossnaida
hananim-i malsseumhasa nae ap-e seo seologa nonjaenghaji malla imi naega neohuiege gyeong-gohaessnola
naega naelin seongoneun byeongyeongdoeji anhnola naega nae jongdeul-ege budangha ji anh-eul geos-ila
eoneunal hananimkkeseo man-won-ingalago jiog-e mul-euni ajig deohayeo eul jaga issnaikka lago malhadeola
geuleona uiloun jadeul-egeneun chingug-i meolji ani haess-euni
igeos-eun chamhoehayeo hananimkke gwiuihago geubun-ui yulbeob-eul junsuhaneun-uiloun jadeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-imyeo
boiji anihamyeo jaaelousinhananim-eul dulyeowo hamyeo geubunkke heon sinhaneun jadeul-eul wihan geos-ini
pyeon-anhi geuligo anjeonhage geu gos-e deul-eogala igeos-i yeongsaeng-ui nal ila
geugos-eneun geudeul-i wonhaneun mo deun geos-i iss-eumyeo hananim gyeot-eneun deomanh-eun geos-i issnola

hananim-eun geudeul ijeon geudeul boda ganghayeossdeon sedaedeul-eul geudeul-ui joe ag-eulo malmiam-a eolmana manh-i myeol mangke hayeossneunyo geuttae geudeul-eun jisang eul banghwanghayeoss-euna geudeul-i pihal gos i iss-eossdeonyo
sillo i an-eneun ma-eum-eul ga jinjawa gwileul giul-in jawa geuligo jinsildoege gwanchalhaneun jaleul wihan gyo hun-i issnola
hananim-eun haneulgwa daejiwa geu deul saiui modeun geos-eul yug-ilgan-e changjohasim-e jogeumdo pigonhaji anihaessnola
geuleomeulo geudeul-i malhaneun geos e geudaeneun innaehala geuligo haega tteugijeon-e geuligo haega jigijeon-e geudae junim-eul chan-yanghala
bamjung-edo geuligo yebaeleul deu lin huedo hananim-eul chan-yanghala
geuligo meolji anhneun gos-eulo buteo iss-eul cheonsaui buleum-e gwileul gi ul-ila
geudeul-i jinliui solileul deudge doel geunal-i balo buhwal-ui nal-i doe lila
hananim-i saengmyeong-eul jusa saengmyeong eul as-agani choehuui mogjeogjineun geu bun-isila
daejiga gallajineun nal geudeul-eun seodulleo nawa dahamkke moinani geugeos-i hananimkke swiun geos-ila
hananim-eun geudeul-i malhaneun modeun geos-eul algo issnani geudaeneun geudeul-ege gang-yohaneun ja anila geuleo meulo hananim-ui gyeong-goleul dulyeowo ha neun jadeul-ege i kkulan-eul nangsonghala
bunsanke haneun balam-eulo maengsehamyeo
mugeoun geos-eul unbanhaneun guleum-eu lo maengsehamyeo
sunhanghaneun baelosseo maengsehamyeo
hananim-ui myeonglyeong-e ttala chugbog-eulbunbaehayeo juneun cheonsalosseo maengseha noni
sillo neohuiege yagsogdoen geos-eun jinsil-ila
simpan-i god olila
wanjeonhan gwedoleul gajin haneullo maengsehanani
sillo neohuineun ilchihaji anhneun nonjaeng-eul ilsamneun jadeul-ila
jinsillobuteo meol-eojyeo hyeonhogdoen ja machangajilo yuheugdoenola
geojishaneun jadeul wie jeojuga iss-eulini
geudeul-eun honlan-ui hongsu sog-eseo mugwansimhaessdeon jadeullo
simpan-ui nal-i eonje oneunyo lago mul-eumae
geudeul-i buljiog-e deul-eoga tae wojineun nal-ila
i beol-eul masbola neohuiga seodul leo jaechoghaessdeon geos-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun saem-i issneun cheongug-eseo geojuhamyeo
junimkkeseo buyeohan eunhyesog-eseo gippeohanani ineun geudeul-i uilobge sal-assgi ttaemun-ila
geudeul-eun bam-edo manh-eun jam-eul ja ji anihago
ileun saebyeogbuteo
geuga gajin jaesanjung-eseo pil-yo lo han jawa yoguhaji moshan ja-ege iljeonghan mogs-eul bepuneun jala
daeji wieneun mid-eum-i hwaggohan jadeul-eul wihan yejeungdeul-i iss-eumyeo
neohui ma-eumsog-edo issgeoneul neo huineun alji moshaneunyo
haneul-eneun neohuiga il-yonghal yang sig-i iss-eumyeo ttohan neohuiege yagsog doen geosdo issnola
haneulgwa daejiui junim-eulo maeng sehasa igeos-eun neohuiga seolo-ege malhago issneun geoscheoleom jinlila
abeulaham-ui jongyeongbadneun sonnim-uiyaegiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
geudeul-i geuege pyeong-anhasoseo lago insahani geudo pyeong-anhasoseolago alji moshan geudeul-ege insahadeo la
geuttaeneun jaeppalli geuui jib-an-eu lo deul-eoga saljjin song-aji hanmalileul gajyeowa
geugeos-eul geudeul ap-e noh-eumyeonseo deusiji anhgessseubnikka lago malhayeossdeola

geudeul-i meogji anihaja geuneun geudeul-eul dulyeowo hayeossnola ittae geu deul-i dulyeowo haji mallago malhamyeo geuege chongmyeonghan adeul-i iss-eul geos-i laneun gippeun sosig-eul jeonhayeossdeola
ittae keuge us-eumyeo geuui anaega dagawa geunyeoui imaleul ttaelimyeo neulg-go bul-im-ui yeoseong-i aeleul gajneundan mal-iyo lago malhamae
geudeul-eun junimkkeseo geuleohge mal sseum-i iss-eoss-euni sillo geubun-eun jihye wa asim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila daedabhayeossdeola
